text:
@realDonaldTrump Poor Trump... such a VICTIM! 
On the top of all those “deep state” conspiracies, Democrats & Obama now created a CORONAVIRUS to kill “HIS ECONOMY”... 
Those two & @Fox  are PATHETIC &  should be ASHAMED of their role in defending this SICK WEAK CROOK in the @WhiteHouse.
#Enough
